65 class ModifyPlanningScene : public PropagatingEitherWay
66 {
67 public:
68  using Names = std::vector<std::string>;
69  using ApplyCallback = std::function<void(const planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr&, const PropertyMap&)>;
70  ModifyPlanningScene(const std::string& name = "modify planning scene");
71 
72  void computeForward(const InterfaceState& from) override;
73  void computeBackward(const InterfaceState& to) override;
74 
76  void setCallback(const ApplyCallback& cb) { callback_ = cb; }
77 
79  void attachObjects(const Names& objects, const std::string& attach_link, bool attach);
81  void addObject(const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_object);
83  void removeObject(const std::string& object_name);
84 
86  inline void attachObject(const std::string& object, const std::string& link);
87  inline void detachObject(const std::string& object, const std::string& link);
88 
90  template <typename T, typename E = typename std::enable_if_t<
91  is_container<T>::value && std::is_base_of<std::string, typename T::value_type>::value>>
92  inline void attachObjects(const T& objects, const std::string& link) {
93  attachObjects(Names(objects.cbegin(), objects.cend()), link, true);
94  }
95  template <typename T, typename E = typename std::enable_if_t<
96  is_container<T>::value && std::is_base_of<std::string, typename T::value_type>::value>>
97  inline void detachObjects(const T& objects, const std::string& link) {
98  attachObjects(Names(objects.cbegin(), objects.cend()), link, false);
99  }
100 
102  void allowCollisions(const Names& first, const Names& second, bool allow);
104  void allowCollisions(const std::string& first, const std::string& second, bool allow) {
105  allowCollisions(Names{ first }, Names{ second }, allow);
106  }
108  void allowCollisions(const std::string& object, bool allow) { allowCollisions(Names({ object }), Names(), allow); }
109 
111  template <typename T1, typename T2,
112  typename E1 = typename std::enable_if_t<is_container<T1>::value &&
113  std::is_convertible<typename T1::value_type, std::string>::value>,
114  typename E2 = typename std::enable_if_t<is_container<T2>::value &&
115  std::is_convertible<typename T1::value_type, std::string>::value>>
116  inline void allowCollisions(const T1& first, const T2& second, bool enable_collision) {
117  allowCollisions(Names(first.cbegin(), first.cend()), Names(second.cbegin(), second.cend()), enable_collision);
118  }
120  template <typename T, typename E = typename std::enable_if_t<
121  is_container<T>::value && std::is_convertible<typename T::value_type, std::string>::value>>
122  inline void allowCollisions(const std::string& first, const T& second, bool enable_collision) {
123  allowCollisions(Names({ first }), Names(second.cbegin(), second.cend()), enable_collision);
124  }
126  template <typename T, typename E = typename std::enable_if_t<
127  is_container<T>::value && std::is_convertible<typename T::value_type, std::string>::value>>
128  inline void allowCollisions(const char* first, const T& second, bool enable_collision) {
129  allowCollisions(Names({ first }), Names(second.cbegin(), second.cend()), enable_collision);
130  }
132  void allowCollisions(const std::string& first, const moveit::core::JointModelGroup& jmg, bool allow);
133 
134 protected:
135  // list of objects to attach (true) / detach (false) to a given link
136  std::map<std::string, std::pair<Names, bool>> attach_objects_;
137  // list of objects to add / remove to the planning scene
138  std::vector<moveit_msgs::CollisionObject> collision_objects_;
139 
140  // list of objects to mutually
141  struct CollisionMatrixPairs
142  {
143  Names first;
144  Names second;
145  bool allow;
146  };
147  std::list<CollisionMatrixPairs> collision_matrix_edits_;
148  ApplyCallback callback_;
149 
150 protected:
151  // apply stored modifications to scene
152  InterfaceState apply(const InterfaceState& from, bool invert);
153  void processCollisionObject(planning_scene::PlanningScene& scene, const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& object);
154  void attachObjects(planning_scene::PlanningScene& scene, const std::pair<std::string, std::pair<Names, bool>>& pair,
155  bool invert);
156  void allowCollisions(planning_scene::PlanningScene& scene, const CollisionMatrixPairs& pairs, bool invert);
157 };
158 
159 inline void ModifyPlanningScene::attachObject(const std::string& object, const std::string& link) {
160  attachObjects(Names({ object }), link, true);
161 }
162 
163 inline void ModifyPlanningScene::detachObject(const std::string& object, const std::string& link) {
164  attachObjects(Names({ object }), link, false);
165 }
